name: Rablat
description:
Take on the role of an aging scientist, who has gotten tired of being called crazy! His latest invention has just been finished and is now about to be put in use for the first time.

Genre: Adventure containing Point & Click and Platforming elements.

The game was made for Ludum Dare 43 as part of the Compo category. Which means it had to be created in less than 48 hours and it everything had to be created by yourself!

Some parts are less polished than I would have liked to, but time constraints is part of the challenge for a reason.

*Update 1: Version 2 allows resizing the window, while maintaining the aspect ratio. *

*Update 2: Version 3 fixed a non-intended way to end the game in the last level.*

Edit: Rablat Version2.zip  is sometimes flagged as malicious by Chrome, but this is a false positive. Here is the VirusTotal scan of the zip file: https://www.virustotal.com/#/file/16ceabf600a1cbd667ad4d595e58a004a3e5db8765ebb0...
